医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球糖尿病负担：新研究揭示了令人震惊的患病率和 2050 年的预测全球糖尿病患病率和负担的综合估计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Global-burden-of-diabetes-new-study-reveals-alarming-prevalence-and-projections-for-2050.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Global-burden-of-diabetes-new-study-reveals-alarming-prevalence-and-projections-for-2050.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52c65610-5de9-4699-99cc-9a42a5b9dd05 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 04:05:00 -0400 Global burden of diabetes: new study reveals alarming prevalence and projections for 2050
BUB1蛋白及其激酶活性可能调节EGFR激活一篇新的研究论文发表在《Aging》（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 15 卷第 13 期，题为“Budding uninhibited by benzimidillos-1 (BUB1) ) 通过减少 EGFR 内化来调节 EGFR 信号传导。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/BUB1- Protein-and-its-kinase-activity-may-regulate-EGFR-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/BUB1- Protein-and-its-kinase-activity-may-regulate-EGFR-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27e5bd09-7482-4b49-89ee-5031845147ee Tue, 18 Jul 2023 03:45:28 -0400 BUB1 protein and its kinase activity may regulate EGFR activation
荟萃分析证实 17 种关键代谢物是痛风的强有力预测因子研究人员总结了利用代谢组学检测痛风患者代谢物的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Meta-analysis-confirms-17-key-metabolites-as-strong-predictors-of-gout.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Meta-analysis-confirms-17-key-metabolites-as-strong-predictors-of-gout.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05e2740f-a61a-42fd-9945-dab66a23270f Tue, 18 Jul 2023 03:34:00 -0400 Meta-analysis confirms 17 key metabolites as strong predictors of gout
研究报告中国大陆首例输入性MPOX病例猴痘 (mpox) 是一种由猴痘病毒 (MPXV) 引起的人畜共患疾病，自发现以来主要局限于中非和西非国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-reports-the-first-local-case-of-mpox-caused-by-imported-case-in-the-Chinese-mainland.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230718/Study-reports-the-first-local-case-of-mpox-caused-by-imported-case-in-the-Chinese-mainland.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e466c78-6a97-4532-86e0-c4348bd0ed32 Tue, 18 Jul 2023 00:01:28 -0400 Study reports the first local case of mpox caused by imported case in the Chinese mainland
无症状咽喉带菌是 A 族链球菌感染传播的关键突破性研究发现，在感染率高的社区中，A 族链球菌 (GAS) 感染更有可能通过无症状的咽喉携带传播，而不是通过皮肤接触传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Asymptomatic-throat-carriage-is-the-key-to-transmission-of-Group-A-Streptococcus-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Asymptomatic-throat-carriage-is-the-key-to-transmission-of-Group-A-Streptococcus-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acdec1c2-3b83-4b0f-9d74-8b192bcc3846 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 23:52:00 -0400 Asymptomatic throat carriage is the key to transmission of Group A Streptococcus infections
对疫苗的犹豫和缺乏医疗保健导致农村地区的 COVID-19 死亡人数增加2020 年（COVID-19 大流行的第一年）和 2021 年（第二年）之间存在一个显着差异：在第二年，疫苗变得容易获得。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Vaccine-hesitancy-and-lack-of-healthcare-access-led-to-higher-COVID-19-deaths-in-rural-areas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Vaccine-hesitancy-and-lack-of-healthcare-access-led-to-higher-COVID-19-deaths-in-rural-areas.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7daec0e8-960e-40d8-91a4-93cde3858791 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 23:21:00 -0400 Vaccine hesitancy and lack of healthcare access led to higher COVID-19 deaths in rural areas
追踪脑电波特征可以降低术后脑功能障碍的风险当患者接受全身麻醉时，他们的大脑活动通常会减慢，陷入昏迷状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Tracking-brain-wave-signatures-could-reduce-the-risk-of-postoperative-brain-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Tracking-brain-wave-signatures-could-reduce-the-risk-of-postoperative-brain-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ae6fc01-16f6-4521-88db-a87d7e5f0c1c Mon, 17 Jul 2023 23:14:00 -0400 Tracking brain wave signatures could reduce the risk of postoperative brain dysfunction
在手术室开始硬膜外麻醉可能有助于更好地控制疼痛当患者仍在手术室 (OR) 时开始患者自控硬膜外麻醉 (PCEA) 输注 -；而不是手术后在恢复室-；在美国麻醉医师协会虚拟麻醉质量和患者安全会议上发表的研究表明，可能有助于提供更好的疼痛控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Starting-epidurals-in-the-OR-may-help-provide-better-pain-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Starting-epidurals-in-the-OR-may-help-provide-better-pain-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28891394-3300-4cd5-b449-1faf79b91319 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 23:09:00 -0400 Starting epidurals in the OR may help provide better pain control
急性淋巴细胞白血病儿童的五年生存率持续增加所有急性淋巴细胞白血病 (ALL) 儿童的五年生存率持续增加至 94%。对 800 名荷兰儿童的研究表明了这一点。在该研究中，检查了四个亚组的修改后的治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Five-year-survival-of-children-with-acute-lymphatic-leukemia-continues-to-increase.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Five-year-survival-of-children-with-acute-lymphatic-leukemia-continues-to-increase.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85feb424-fc6a-4f38-afcd-291650fd737f Mon, 17 Jul 2023 23:03:00 -0400 Five-year survival of children with acute lymphatic leukemia continues to increase
研究人员发现导致左心发育不良综合征的新基因通过识别患者体内的基因并测试其对果蝇的影响，桑福德伯纳姆普雷比学院的研究人员发现了导致左心发育不全综合征 (HLHS) 的新基因，这是一种发生在婴儿身上的罕见的危及生命的心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Researchers-find-new-genes-that-c​​ontribute-to-hypoplasty-left-heart-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Researchers-find-new-genes-that-c​​ontribute-to-hypoplasty-left-heart-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdc82e05-61c1-4cdb-9a2c-fdff5c7c08cb Mon, 17 Jul 2023 22:58:00 -0400 Researchers find new genes that contribute to hypoplastic left heart syndrome
